name: Galaxy Squad
description: Galaxy squad is a hardcore turn-based tactical roguelike, inspired by FTL and XCOM.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Card with OpenGL support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
